nodes.text: Lavik was a Twi'lek male private in the Rift Alliance Coalition Forces during the Galactic War. He served under the Lieutenant Felix Iresso on Hoth and assisted the Barsen'thor of the Jedi Order during the Jedi's mission to Hoth. After Iresso was permanently transferred over to the Jedi, Lavik was promoted to a specialist, which Iresso celebrated. Lavik was sent to Ord Mantell for training.
